${modID}:TWITCH_STREAMER_RELIC.NAME: Twitch Streamer
${modID}:TWITCH_STREAMER_RELIC.FLAVOR: You are a Twitch streamer, and can amass adoring fans in the form of subscribers.
DESCRIPTIONS: subscribers and will start each combat with that many followers. Gaining a subscriber grants 2 gold.

${modID}:ACTIVE_STREAMER_RELIC.NAME: Active Streamer
${modID}:ACTIVE_STREAMER_RELIC.FLAVOR: Unlike some you stream actively, and slowly but surely gain subscribers.

${modID}:PROMOTED_TWITCH_STREAMER_RELIC.NAME: Promoted Twitch Streamer
${modID}:PROMOTED_TWITCH_STREAMER_RELIC.FLAVOR: You are a Promoted Twitch streamer, and can amass adoring fans much faster.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 4 Extra Subscribers after each combat.

${modID}:NATURAL_LEADER_RELIC.NAME: Natural Leader
${modID}:NATURAL_LEADER_RELIC.FLAVOR: People can't help but be drawn to you and your gangs.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, progress all gangs by 2.

${modID}:HARDY_BOYS_COLLAR_RELIC.NAME: Hardy Boy's Collar
${modID}:HARDY_BOYS_COLLAR_RELIC.FLAVOR: The strength of the Hardy Boy flows through you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 temporary Strength whenever you play an ${modID}:Animal_Card.

${modID}:NICE_RELIC.NAME: Nice
DESCRIPTIONS: Your max HP is 69. It cannot be changed. Nice.

${modID}:CUM_KING_RELIC.NAME: Cum King
${modID}:CUM_KING_RELIC.FLAVOR: You are the King of Cum. For some reason that helps you draw cards.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw an extra card at the start of each turn.

${modID}:MARKETABLE_FACE_RELIC.NAME: Marketable Face
${modID}:MARKETABLE_FACE_RELIC.FLAVOR: People are drawn to your good looks and charisma. You tend to gain subscribers faster.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain subscribers, gain 1 more.

${modID}:PACK_LEADER_RELIC.NAME: Pack Leader
${modID}:PACK_LEADER_RELIC.FLAVOR: As the leader of the pack, your animals are always there to defend you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 3 Block whenever you play an ${modID}:Animal_Card.

${modID}:POWERFUL_INFLUENCE_RELIC.NAME: Powerful Influence
${modID}:POWERFUL_INFLUENCE_RELIC.FLAVOR: Your growing popularity has granted you greater influence even over your own cards.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your first Choose 1 card each fight has all options combined.

${modID}:MONSTER_ENERGY_RELIC.NAME: Powerful Influence
${modID}:MONSTER_ENERGY_RELIC.FLAVOR: The highs and lows of caffeine follow you into battle.

${modID}:FAMOUS_PERSON_DISCOUNT_RELIC.NAME: Famous Person Discount
${modID}:FAMOUS_PERSON_DISCOUNT_RELIC.FLAVOR: Gathering enough of a following can be quite profitable.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have at least 100 subscribers, gain a 40% discount at all stores.
